summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Fifty-fifth Street from Nineteenth Avenue N. E. to Twentieth Avenue N. E. et al, in the City of Seattle, by laying watemains under Ordinance No. 18670, creating Local Improvement District No. 1771 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
